name: Salmon Lentil Salad
author: iamalthea
summary: A nice, filling salad that can be eaten warm or cold.
ingredients: 1 cup water, or as needed to cover
5  small fresh mozzarella balls (boccaccini), cut into quarters  (Optional)
¼ cup diced cucumber, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Put lentils in a small pot with enough water to just cover; cook on medium heat until tender, 10 to 15 minutes
Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Cook salmon under the preheated broiler until the fish flakes easily with a fork, 5 to 7 minutes per side
Chop salmon and set aside to cool
Heat a small skillet over medium-high heat; cook bacon in skillet until crisp, 7 to 10 minutes
Chop bacon and set aside to cool
Mix cooled lentils, salmon, bacon, red onion, mozzarella, and cucumber together in a large bowl
Whisk balsamic vinegar, olive oil, garlic, mustard, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl; drizzle over the lentil mixture and stir gently to coat
